page.title: 09LEISURE FACILITIES,EGERTON
page.content: The area has three centres for sporting activities, a cricket club, a sailing club, and a golf club. The Church Community Centre in the old school provides facilities for dances, ballet tuition, amateur operatics and drama, church groups, and uniformed organisations. There is a park, with tennis courts, a bowling green, and play facilities for younger children. There are four public houses, three of which serve meals, and two restaurants. Both schools have playing fields which provide for children's sporting activities, although there is concern over the lack of facilities for young people.
